reviewText: My favorite series and my favorite season of my favorite series.

I watched this and the other 3 seasons on computer for free watching, however I had some difficulty with that rout and since I enjoyed it soo much I had to buy it. I'm not going to say anything on what happens only because I might give out info. that might make you not watch it. Try watching it on Netflix before buying or the net and see if it's something you would like. My reason is well... Simply I loved the whole show
The series is all about friendship and the strong bonds between students who take up a role in being someone's "sister". Good show to watch, family-friendly.

The show has its share of twists that fans of the series will love. Moreover, It has those longer arcs that made season 1 and 2 so captivating. The OP is kind of upbeat but not necessarily in a bad way. YOSHINO SPIIIIIIIIIIN!
